title: Modern Portfolio Website
description: A responsive and SEO-friendly personal portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, showcasing projects, certifications, and a contact form.

title: NeoShell: Terminal Experience Prototype
description: An experimental shell UI designed to enhance CLI interactions and productivity. Aimed at building the foundation for an open-source terminal experience with AI integration in future iterations.

title: ReconX: Cloud Threat Reconnaissance Lab
description: A cybersecurity lab environment simulating threat reconnaissance scenarios in the cloud. Used to study lateral movement, misconfigurations, and detection strategies.

title: MrSpecks Portfolio (Next.js Site)
description: A premium personal portfolio site to showcase bio, projects, certifications, and contact information. Built with Next.js, styled using Tailwind, and hosted on GitHub Pages.

title: Azure Resource Manager Lab
description: Deployed and configured a virtual network, storage account, and VM using ARM templates as part of Azure cloud architecture practice.
